author: admin
title: Irish Titan Hires Additional Employees
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/19/2015 @ 7:20 AM   Irish Titan MINNEAPOLIS, MN--(Marketwired - October 19, 2015) - Irish Titan , a digital agency that specializes in eCommerce, complex websites, and digital strategy, has continued to grow, adding additional personnel to their roster. The additions mark a streak of continued growth for the agency, increasing their headcount, a trend that they hope to continue through the end of the year. 
Brian Cole , Claire Campbell , and Sheena Heikkila joined the agency late this summer, growing the strategy, design, and project management departments, respectively. Cole, who has over a decade of digital marketing experience under his belt, was formerly a Senior Digital Marketing Strategist at FindLaw , a division of Thomson Reuters . Cole has joined the team as an Experience Planner, a welcome augmentation to the agency’s digital strategy team. Cole will continue to utilize his skillset and experience to develop strategic digital experiences on behalf of Irish Titan’s clients. 
Claire Campbell has joined the team as User Experience Designer, a newly formed position designed to broaden the firm’s design and usability offerings. Campbell brings with her a unique blend of experiences, each of which draws on her passion to connect people with the information that they are seeking. That passion will continue to be put to use as she advocates for user usability, helping to create more engaging, helpful digital experiences, a mission that Irish Titan has endeavored to deliver for each and every one of their projects. 
Sheena Heikkila, who has worked in the agency space for the majority of her career, has come on board as an Interactive Project Manager. Heikkila, who has over 8 years of experience working as a project manager for other Minneapolis-based agencies, has worked with companies ranging from Fortune 100’s to local start-ups, and will continue to draw on that experience in her position with Irish Titan. 
The agency is looking to continue to grow and will be continuing to hire for a multitude of positions through the end of the year. If you are interested in learning more, please visit https://www.irishtitan.com/careers . Contact:
